snippet.title: WetBread | Teaser Trailer (2022)
snippet.description:
We are a group of friends working on video game project called "WetBread"!
We are doing this purely out of passion in our after work free time, every supporter will mean a literal world to us!

About the game
Our task is to catch the devious Big Billy, a rat in a vest, to take revenge for kidnapping our family, but most importantly to save the surviving members of it. 

As the last Dry Rusk, we travel through the store shelves of various departments, enemies and bosses. 

When Big Billy ran away, he turned on the fire sprinklers so that our hero could not catch up with him. The water has soaked everything in the store, so we have to face the zombie products - soaked breads that are falling apart from the water and the disadvantageous conditions of the store, blocked passages and water spilled everywhere.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2157760/WetBread/
Discord: https://discord.gg/uYj2dra9TA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WetBreadGame
Buymeacoffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/wetbreadgame
____________________________

Music used: 
Wax Lyricyst - Up Then Down

____________________________
